author: Ray White
title: Here's how to cut your hair at home
description: Many states across the U.S. have closed hair salons as part of their stay-at-home orders, but that hasn't stopped our hair from growing. We asked professional hair stylist Cash Lawless to give us some tips and tricks on how to cut your hair at home.  Read mor…
content: Many states across the U.S. have closed hair salons as part of their stay-at-home orders, but that hasn't stopped our hair from growing. We asked professional hair stylist Cash Lawless to give us some tips and tricks on how to cut your hair at home.
